Html:
I am trying to set the position of a GmapImage but it's telling me that no constructors take 1 argument. It works in the Demo.clouds project but doesn't work in mine. Is it a version problem?
This is what I am doing and doesn't work. I also checked for a method for setting the position but couldn't find it. I am trying to integrate the Demo.clouds code in my project
PointLatLng gtl = new PointLatLng(50.4066263673011, -127.620375523875);
GmapImage clouds = new GMapImage(gtl);
